CustomField.formula: IF( TVA_CFB__File_Size_in_Bytes__c > 1000000000, TEXT(ROUND(TVA_CFB__File_Size_in_Bytes__c / 1073741824, 1)) & " GB", IF( TVA_CFB__File_Size_in_Bytes__c > 1000000, TEXT( ROUND( TVA_CFB__File_Size_in_Bytes__c/ 1048576, 1)) & " MB", IF(TVA_CFB__File_Size_in_Bytes__c > 1000, TEXT( ROUND(TVA_CFB__File_Size_in_Bytes__c / 1024,1)) & " KB", IF( TVA_CFB__File_Size_in_Bytes__c> 0, "1 KB", "0 KB") ) ) )
CustomField.label: File Size
